Trade/Device Name(s): Rightest Blood Glucose Monitoring System, Model GM100
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Rightest Blood Glucose Monitoring System, Model GM100 for quantitative glucose measurement in capillary whole blood using amperometry.
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro diagnostic use by professional healthcare personnel or diabetics at home to measure glucose concentration in capillary whole blood from fingertip, palm, and forearm to aid diabetes management; not intended for neonate blood samples.
